pullRequest.title: use appropriate serializer with correct documentation (bsc#1168083)

What does this PR change?
Introduce a new serializer with a subset of field from the SystemOverviewSerializer.

nodes.bodyText: I guess you forgot to remove SystemOverviewSerializer
nodes.diffHunk:

nodes.bodyText: We need to make the same changes for listActiveSystems methods and it's overloaded variants if there are.
Same as above, similar changes for systemListShortActive to be consistent.
